movie.title: Up the River
movie.description_intro: Away from the city for the weekend, Rebecca must choose between her fiance, Thomas, and his best friend, Willy.
movie.description_full: Away from the city for the weekend, Rebecca must choose between her fiance, Thomas, and his best friend, Willy.

movies.title: Resident Evil: Degeneration
movies.summary: Seven years after the Raccoon City incident, a man heartbroken from losing loved ones in the destroyed city unleashes a remnant T-Virus in an airport, forcing special agent Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield, close allies and hardened survivors of the Raccoon City incident, to quell the outbreak and discover the truth behind it all.
movies.description_full: Seven years after the Raccoon City incident, a man heartbroken from losing loved ones in the destroyed city unleashes a remnant T-Virus in an airport, forcing special agent Leon S. movies.title: Equinox
movies.summary: Four teenagers go on a woods hike and encounter a creepy forest ranger and a crazy old man. The old man is a scientist who had found a mysterious book bound in human skin, the Necronomicon, and when he had read its cryptic symbols it conjured monsters into existence. The teenagers keep the book, and are then persued by monsters, a demonic cult, and the ranger. The ranger turns out to be a red flying devil in human disguise.

movies.title: Curse III: Blood Sacrifice
movies.summary: In 1950s Africa, a tribal magician calls up a demon to kill Europeans.
movies.description_full: In 1950s Africa, a tribal magician calls up a demon to kill Europeans.
movies.synopsis: In 1950s Africa, a tribal magician calls up a demon to kill Europeans.

movies.title: King of the Gypsies
movies.summary: Eric Roberts makes an impressive screen debut as Dave, grandson of the aging King Zharko, who is chosen by him to lead the gypsy clan at his death. Dave's only inclination is to join the American mainstream, but he knows that the mantle of gypsy power cannot be taken lightly or denied.
